name: fail-writes/match-where-create-1
query:
MATCH (n:Person)-[e]->(m:Person)
WHERE n.name = "Remy" AND n.name = "Adam"
CREATE (n)-[e]->(m)
RETURN n;

expect.plan:
ANALYZE ERROR
-------* Query error
     2 | WHERE n.name = "Remy" AND n.name = "Adam"
     3 | CREATE (n)-[e]->(m)
       |           ^^^^^^
-------* Edges cannot be inputs to write queries
expect.result:
ANALYZE ERROR
-------* Query error
     2 | WHERE n.name = "Remy" AND n.name = "Adam"
     3 | CREATE (n)-[e]->(m)
       |           ^^^^^^
-------* Edges cannot be inputs to write queries
